meanings.definition: A player piano that operates automatically by means of perforated paper rolls.
meanings.sent1: The pianola played music all by itself.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed listening to the pianola at the party.
meanings.sent3: The pianola seemed to have a mind of its own, entertaining us with its tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the keys of the pianola, creating beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the pianola filled the room, transporting us to another time.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of player piano.
meanings.sent1: I saw a pianola in the music store.
meanings.sent2: The pianola was a popular choice for music lovers in the early 1900s.
meanings.sent3: The pianola proudly displayed its brand name, attracting attention from visitors.
meanings.sent4: The pianola stood out among the other pianos, showcasing its unique features.
meanings.sent5: Owning a pianola was a symbol of status and sophistication back then.
